User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the ReFurrm Scan platform.

zipCode.description: The user's primary ZIP code for location-based services.

ambassadorId.description: The ID of the Ambassador assigned to this user's region.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user account was created.

roles.description: A list of roles assigned to the user, e.g., 'Ambassador'.

subscriptionStatus.description: The current status of the user's subscription (if applicable).

stripeCustomerId.description: The user's Stripe customer ID for billing.

Item.title: Item
Item.description: Represents an item listed on the ReFurrm Scan marketplace.

userId.description: Reference to the User who listed this item.

price.description: The user-defined price of the item.

aiEstimatedValue.description: The market value of the item as estimated by AI.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image for the item.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the item was listed.

status.description: The current status of the item in the marketplace.

Sale.title: Sale
Sale.description: Represents a sale of an item on the ReFurrm Scan marketplace.

itemId.description: Reference to the Item that was sold.

buyerId.description: Reference to the User who purchased the item.

sellerId.description: Reference to the User who sold the item.

ambassadorId.description: The ID of the Ambassador who facilitated the sale, if any.

salePrice.description: Price at which the item was sold.

ethicalContributionId.description: Reference to the associated ethical contribution for this sale.

Pickup.title: Pickup
Pickup.description: Represents a pickup request for a sold item.

id.description: Unique identifier for the pickup request.

saleId.description: Reference to the Sale for which the pickup is requested.

pickupDate.description: Date and time of the scheduled pickup.

address.description: Address where the item needs to be picked up.

status.description: Status of the pickup request (e.g., requested, scheduled, completed).

EthicalContribution.title: EthicalContribution
EthicalContribution.description: Represents an ethical funding contribution made from a sale for the LEAN Foundation.

saleId.description: Reference to the Sale from which the contribution is made.

ServiceRequest.title: ServiceRequest
ServiceRequest.description: Represents a user's request for a specialized Ambassador service.

id.description: Unique identifier for the service request.

userId.description: The ID of the user making the request.

zipCode.description: The ZIP code where the service is needed.

notes.description: Additional notes from the user about the service request, can include inventory scan results.

status.description: The current status of the request.

assignedAmbassadorId.description: The ID of the matched Ambassador, if any.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the request was created.

AmbassadorApplication.title: AmbassadorApplication
AmbassadorApplication.description: Represents an application to become a ReFurrm Ambassador.

userId.description: The ID of the user submitting the application.

whyReFurrm.description: The applicant's explanation for their interest in the mission.

operationalExperience.description: The applicant's self-reported operational or entrepreneurial experience.

zipCode.description: The primary ZIP code the applicant wishes to serve.

transportation.description: The type of transportation the applicant has available.

videoIntroUrl.description: An optional URL to a video introduction.

status.description: The current status of the application.

aiScore.description: An AI-generated score indicating the applicant's fit.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the application was submitted.

PrivateAppraisal.title: PrivateAppraisal
PrivateAppraisal.description: Represents a private item appraisal saved by a user, not for public listing. This is the user's personal log of AI valuation history.

id.description: Unique identifier for the private appraisal (Log_ID).

userId.description: The ID of the user who saved the appraisal.

itemName.description: The final name of the item as edited by the user.

aiSuggestedTitle.description: The original title suggested by the AI.

aiSuggestedDescription.description: The original description snippet suggested by the AI.

minPrice.description: The minimum price suggested by the AI (AI_Price_Min).

maxPrice.description: The maximum price suggested by the AI (AI_Price_Max).

appraisalNote.description: The AI's justification for the price range (Justification_Text).

categoryTag.description: The AI-assigned category for the item.

authenticityVerdict.description: The AI's verdict on the item's authenticity.

imageUrl.description: A data URI or URL of the item's image.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the appraisal was saved (Scan_Timestamp).

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure has been updated to support the core business logic. The User entity now includes 'tier', 'subscriptionStatus', and 'stripeCustomerId' to manage user roles and billing. The Item entity has a 'status' to track its lifecycle (listed, sold, shipped) and 'aiEstimatedValue'. The Sale entity now more clearly separates seller and buyer IDs and links to an EthicalContribution, which is its own top-level collection to serve as a proper ledger for the LEAN Foundation. A new 'ServiceRequest' entity and collection have been added to handle specialized service requests, linking users to Ambassadors. A new 'AmbassadorApplication' entity and collection have been added to manage the hiring pipeline for new Ambassadors, enabling AI-powered screening and manual review workflows.
